name: iteratively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is repeated again and again, usually to improve something: In the practice of coding, these processes will be done in parallel and iteratively. The procedure continues iteratively until the last column is reached.
More examplesFewer examplesPhase Three must re-run the analysis on the next set of data in order to iteratively seek agreement.You start with the best model you can come up with and iteratively improve it over years, decades, even centuries.
